This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleClass where concept is-a _RoleClassRelationshipFormal

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleClass
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _RoleClassRelationshipFormalRoleClassRelationshipFormalA relationship between two entities that is formally recognized, frequently by a contract or similar agreement.

name: RoleClassRelationshipFormal
title: RoleClassRelationshipFormal
description: A relationship between two entities that is formally recognized, frequently by a contract or similar agreement.
